Package util

Class Input

Object
Input
public class Input extends Object

This is a class to store and maintain a Scanner object. Depends on Log class to print messages

Since:
1-11-2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sim Yi Wan Terence

  • Field Details

    • scanner

      private Scanner scanner
      The scanner object. Should only have one for each inputStream open at once.

  • Method Details

    • createScanner

      private void createScanner(InputStream inputStream)
      Creates the scanner object with provided input stream.
      Parameters:
      inputStream - provided input stream

    • getScanner

      public Scanner getScanner()
      Returns the scanner object
      Returns:
      scanner object

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the scanner object if not null. Sets scanner to null upon close.

    • getInt

      public int getInt(String msg)
      Gets an int from the user. Handles invalid non-int input
      Parameters:
      msg - msg to cue user
      Returns:
      gotten int

    • getDouble

      public double getDouble(String msg)
      Gets an double from the user. Handles invalid non-double input
      Parameters:
      msg - msg to cue user
      Returns:
      gotten double

    • getLine

      public String getLine(String msg)
      Gets an string(line) from the user. No checking done.
      Parameters:
      msg - msg to cue user
      Returns:
      gotten string

    • getDate

      public LocalDate getDate(String msg)
      Gets an date from the user. Handles invalid non-date input in wrong format.
      Parameters:
      msg - msg to cue user
      Returns:
      gotten date object

    • getBool

      public boolean getBool(String msg)
      Gets an boolean from the user. Has a hashmap of responses, handles invalid input if user keys in something not in hashmap.
      Parameters:
      msg - msg to cue user
      Returns:
      gotten boolean
